Desc.entry: Over 500 years old, Bishop's House is a living time capsule where history seeps out of every wall and soot stained fireplace. A rare window on life in Sheffield before the steel and smog, beautifully situated in Meersbrook Park.

DisabledAccess.entry: All rooms are wheelchair accessible, apart from the Old Vestry, which is only accessible via steps. Induction loop in Nave only.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri (pre-booked & educational groups only), Sat 10am-4.30pm, Sun 11am-4.30pm (public opening times) please direct out of hours enquiries to the Millenium Gallery

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: All rooms are wheelchair accessible, apart from the Old Vestry, which is only accessible via steps. Induction loop in Nave only.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Fri (pre-booked educational groups only), Sat 10am-4.30pm, Sun 11am-4.30pm (public opening times)
